设想一下，在一个国际交流会上，来自各国的人士都在用英语相互沟通，而几个中国人却用中文。这几个中国人参加交流会的意义是什么？为什么不直接去中国的交流会？那样不是能找到更多可以相互沟通的人吗？

Image that , in an international exchange conference, people from all of the world are using English to do the communication, however few Chinese people are talking in Chinese. Then what is the point of these Chinese in this conference ? Why don't they just go to Chinese exchange conference? Won't they find more people to talk  each other ?
